message.entry: The {0} property value must be a real,finite numeric vector.
The {0} property value must be a 2-element finite numeric vector with the second element greater than the first element.
The Colormap property value must be a predefined colormap or RGB triplets defined as a 3-column matrix with values in the range [0,1].
Too many inputs to the CursorData property. Maximum number of inputs is 3.
Invalid MatrixViewer access. Use dsp.MatrixViewer instead.
Not enough input arguments. Expected string array of size 1x3, got 0.
{0} property value must be character or string
Changing the size of {0} property is not allowed without first calling the release() method.
Expected input data elements to be less than {0}
'RadiusLimits' must be within the limits defined by CustomRadiusData.
'RadiusLimits' must be less than or equal to number of rows in the input matrix.
'RadiusLimits' must be less than or equal to number of rows in the input matrix, and within the limits defined by ‘RadiusOffset’ and ‘RadiusResolution’.
‘AngleSpan’ must be greater than or equal to 5 and less than or equal to 360.
Span of Angle data [{0},{1}] defined by 'AngleOffset','AngleResolution' and number of columns in the given matrix should be greater than or equal to 5 and less than or equal to 360.
Difference between the ‘CustomAngleData’ min and max must be less than or equal to 360.
